title: (x) Spiritualized - Carpenter (Chesh}
content:
Hi all,   
   
I was hoping someone might be able to point me in the direction of a similiar script typeface to the one used on the Spiritualized album Lazer Guided Melodies. I appreciate any advice on this one. Thanks!   
   
 ![Spiritualized - Lazer Guided Melodies](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121135046im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47932.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Scarlet Harlots - Britannic {HBM}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121135046/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6457 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) McNeal's - Bureau Eagle {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121135046/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6455 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Corey Holms

comments.content: Closest I've been able to come up with is [Liorah](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121135046/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/liorah/?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=36&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=lazer+guided+melodies), though this does look familiar.
